ca.uqac.lif.textidote.rules

Class RegexRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uqac.lif.textidote.Rule
      • ca.uqac.lif.textidote.rules.RegexRule

  • public class RegexRule
extends Rule

    Rule based on a regular expression pattern to be found in the text.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.lang.String m_exceptionPattern
      If this pattern is found, the rule does not apply
      protected java.lang.String m_message
      The message template to generate when the pattern is found
      protected java.lang.String m_pattern
      The pattern to find in the text
      protected static int MAX_ITERATIONS
      The maximum number of times the rule can look for the pattern in the text

    • Constructor Detail

      • RegexRule

        public RegexRule(java.lang.String name,
                 java.lang.String pattern,
                 java.lang.String message)

        Creates a new regex rule

        Parameters:
        name - The name given to the rule
        pattern - The pattern to find in the text
        message - The message template to generate when the pattern is found. If the pattern contains capture groups, the message can refer to these capture groups in the usual way (i.e. “$1” refers to the first group, etc.).

      • RegexRule

        public RegexRule(java.lang.String name,
                 java.lang.String pattern,
                 java.lang.String exception,
                 java.lang.String message)

        Creates a new regex rule

        Parameters:
        name - The name given to the rule
        pattern - The pattern to find in the text
        exception - If this pattern is found, the rule does not apply
        message - The message template to generate when the pattern is found. If the pattern contains capture groups, the message can refer to these capture groups in the usual way (i.e. “$1” refers to the first group, etc.).

    • Method Detail

      • evaluate

        public java.util.List<Advice> evaluate(AnnotatedString s,
                                       AnnotatedString original)
        Description copied from class: Rule

        Evaluates the rule on a string

        Specified by:
        evaluate in class Rule
        Parameters:
        s - The string on which to evaluate the rule
        original - The original (untransformed) piece of text
        Returns:
        A list of advice generated from the evaluation of the rule

      • createMessage

        protected java.lang.String createMessage(Match match)

        Creates the message for a specific advice, by replacing references to capture groups in the message template by the actual strings that matched these capture groups

        Parameters:
        match - A match object containing data about the regex match
        Returns:
        The formatted message
